definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:isdemon</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion_advanced"><field name="potion">NAUSEA</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">250</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="ambient"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="particles"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_deal_custom_damage"><value name="damage_number"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="localization_text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">RESTORE!</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
